N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 111.3 - Governance

State Regulations

The executive director shall have the power, and it shall
be his duty to: (a) administer the
selection process, physical facilities and living arrangements for each
school; (b) contract with
outstanding artists and arts organizations in order to provide the artistic
director and staff for each school; (c) contract for instructional facilities, meals, lodging, and transportation of students during the instructional
program. Transportation of students between the schools and their
homes shall not be provided, and shall be the responsibility of the parents or
legal guardian of the student; (d) contract for a head counselor and a
sufficient number of assistant counselors in each school to assist students
with their studies and living arrangements; and
(e) convene meetings of the advisory council, conduct necessary studies and evaluations of the program, and report the
results of such studies and evaluations to the advisory council. Notes
